title.narrative: Green Growth Knowledge Partnership

description.narrative: The GGKP is a global network of international organizations and experts that identifies and addresses major knowledge gaps in green growth theory and practice. By encouraging widespread collaboration and world-class research, the GGKP offers practitioners and policymakers the policy guidance, good practices, tools, and data necessary to support the transition to a green economy.

The GGKP is focused on promoting a green economy transition by identifying major knowledge gaps in green growth theory, policy, and practice and addressing these gaps by promoting collaboration and coordinated research and using world-class knowledge management and communication tools to provide practitioners, policymakers, and other experts with opportunities to access, share, and utilize green growth policy analysis, guidance, lessons learned, information, and data.

mailing-address.narrative: Global Green Growth Institute, 19F Jeongdong Bldg., 21-15 Jeongdong-gil, Jung-gu Seoul 04577 Republic of Korea
